abstract: Secretly, I had to smile when concerned readers and friends thought I was gambling with fate by coasting along with no chef; I was feeling pretty cagey with these two aces up my sleeve. The Cheshire Cat had nothing on me.
snippet: Secretly, I had to smile when concerned readers and friends thought I was gambling with fate by coasting along with no chef; I was feeling pretty cagey with these two aces up my sleeve. The Cheshire Cat had nothing on me.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks ago, I had a chef. Was happy as a clam.

headline.main: Too Many Chefs Spoil the Dream
